title: Nine Inch Nails - Year Zero ARG media
description:
This is a collection of media that I found kicking around my drives from the era of the Nine Inch Nails Year Zero Alternate Reality Game. It includes the entire ARG collected up into printable book form with a data disc of audio and video associated with the game.

There are also a number of other goodies like the Year Zero Foundry Gridnik font, an interview with Trent Reznor about the creation of YZ, the original unedited 39 minute version of the OSR meeting on 18-04-2007 at the conclusion of the game, etc.

The YZ ARG was one of the best online experiences I ever had, and I feel honored to have participated in something so historic.

Full disclosure: I am Wanted Resistance Network Member 24.24.2.2995, according to the US Bureau of Morality (as documented in Exhibit 24)
